nodes.text: Star Wars Trading Post is the name of multiple stores operated by Disney that focus on selling Star Wars merchandise, including souvenirs, clothing and toys—many that are exclusive to Disney Parks. This includes some items previously only available at Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge.

The Disneyland Resort in California first opened a temporary Trading Post location at the Wonderground Gallery in the Downtown Disney District on September 15th, 2020 before moving to a permanent location nearby on February 19th, 2021. The new location is a former Rainforest Cafe themed restaurant converted to represent a hidden jungle Resistance base, and features Rey's speeder outside the entrance.

Another version of the store opened at Walt Disney World in Florida on September 21st, 2020 in the Marketplace area of Disney Springs. A similar store called Star Wars Galactic Outpost can be found in Disney Springs' West Side section.
